item.description:
Due to my new job and losing 40 pounds, I need to go shopping! I've decided to take a trip up to the Tanger Outlet Mall in Tilton, NH. Anybody interested in coming along is welcome to join the carpool.

We'll meet in the parking lot of Joe's American Bar and Grill in Woburn (intersection of rts. 128 & 93). Then have lunch/brunch somewhere near the mall before starting our trek through the 50+ stores. There's even a Lane Bryant Outlet there. Here's a link to the mall's website if you're interested in more details Tanger Outlet - Tilton, NH.
item.name: Outlet Shopping Trip to Tilton, NH.
